column4: quick question how do I extract with wine ? does anyone know ?
extract with wine? you mean use a windows archive program on a compressed file ?
you don't need wine for that
this is telling me I do need it
assuming you are using ubuntu and gnome, you right click on the zip file and select extract here
if the exe is just a self extracting archive you can just use the mthod i mentioned
how come it wont work ? im sorry this is my first day on ubuntu :/
so you unpacked the exe file you got from the linksys website... step one of the page you linked before...follow the rest of the page
it might also be helpful if you gave us the exact url of the page where you downloaded the driver from
also in google i typed : "ubuntu karmic WMP54GS" and got : http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1342611
et al. this is the website : http://www.linksysbycisco.com/US/en/support/WPSM54G/download
the firmware file which i assume is intended to be flashed onto the device and not used as a driver in the operating system of your computer
i doubt you downloaded a OS driver to be honest
